unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Decoding Your Digital Sabha with Follower Analytics**
normalised: **Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Decoding Your Digital Sabha with Follower Analytics**

unnormalised: Hey friends! Ever wondered if your Insta reels are actually hitting the right notes, or if your Twitter musings are just echoing in the digital void like a deserted haveli? Well, worry no more! Follower analytics are here to save the day, like chai after a long day battling Mumbai traffic.
normalised: Hey friends! Ever wondered if your Insta reels are actually hitting the right notes, or if your Twitter musings are just echoing in the digital void like a deserted haveli? Well, worry no more! Follower analytics are here to save the day, like chai after a long day battling Mumbai traffic.

unnormalised: Think of it as your personalized kundali for social media. These tools dig deep into who's actually listening, what kinda content gets them excited enough to double-tap (or even leave a sassy comment!), and when they're most active (think late nights scrolling after binging "Gullak").
normalised: Think of it as your personalized kundali for social media. These tools dig deep into who is actually listening, what kind of content gets them excited enough to double-tap (or even leave a sassy comment!), and when they are most active (think late nights scrolling after binging "Gullak").

unnormalised: Knowing if your audience is mostly college kids from Delhi University or working professionals in Bangalore makes a HUGE difference, right? Are they more into cricket commentary or philosophical quotes from Bhagavad Gita? Analytics tell you all this and more.
normalised: Knowing if your audience is mostly college kids from Delhi University or working professionals in Bangalore makes a huge difference, right? Are they more into cricket commentary or philosophical quotes from Bhagavad Gita? Analytics tell you all this and more.

unnormalised: Imagine using this intel to tailor your content, maybe even collaborating with the perfect micro-influencer to reach that niche audience. Like, imagine a local artist from Jaipur gaining national recognition because their vibrant content resonated with the right follower base!
normalised: Imagine using this intel to tailor your content, maybe even collaborating with the perfect micro-influencer to reach that niche audience. Like, imagine a local artist from Jaipur gaining national recognition because their vibrant content resonated with the right follower base!

unnormalised: Platforms like SocialPilot and even good ol' Instagram insights can give you a starting point. Just remember, it's not about the numbers, it's about understanding your digital sabha (assembly) and building genuine connections. Analyze those stats after your 08/12/2023 campaign launch! Get started by 17:00 hrs on 26/01/2024 for the best results! Happy posting, and may your engagement rates be ever in your favor… before Diwali, 12/11/2023!
